          <title>
            <string language="sl">Primerjava mest antika-srednji vek</string>
            <string language="en">Comparing towns (antiquity - middle ages)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen der Städte (Altertum - mittleres 
Alter)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparer des villes (antiquité - âges moyens)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparando cidades (antiquity - idades médias)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confrontare le città (antichità - Medio Evo)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση των πόλεων (αρχαιότητα - μέσες ηλικίες)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparar las ciudades (antigüedad - edades 
medias)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Primerjava. Vaja spodbuja uporabo pisnih virov (učbenik DZS).</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet for comparing cities from two different eras (antiquity and  middle ages).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">antika</string>
            <string language="en">antiquity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mesto</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">srednji vek</string>
            <string language="en">middle ages</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen für das Vergleichen der Städte von zwei 
unterschiedlichen Ären (Altertum und mittleres Alter).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau pour comparer des villes de deux ères 
différentes (antiquité et âges moyens).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha para comparar cidades de duas eras 
diferentes (antiquity e idades médias).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro per confrontare le città da due
ere differenti (antichità e Medio Evo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας για τη σύγκριση των πόλεων από δύο 
διαφορετικές εποχές (αρχαιότητα και μέσες ηλικίες).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo para comparar ciudades a partir 
de dos diversas eras (antigüedad y edades medias).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mittleres Alter</string>
